metadata.title: CVE-2020-15694 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Nim 1.2.4, the standard library httpClient fails to properly validatethe server response. For example, httpClient.get().contentLength() does notraise any error if a malicious server provides a negative Content-Length.

criterions.comment: nim package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
